Cession.origin: [such district…as may, by of particular States…become the seat of the government of the United States " U.S. Constitution art. I"]

1.definition: an act of cedinga yielding (as of property) to another

sub_terms.a: assignment or transfer of property rights by a debtor to a creditor
sub_terms.b: transfer of liability by an insurer to a reinsurer
sub_terms.c: transfer of control of or sovereignty over specific property or territory esp. by treaty [such district…as may, by of particular States…become the seat of the government of the United States "art. I"]

2.definition: the monetary amount of liability ceded by an insurer to a reinsurer compare
